timeline.message:
Stop setting OMR_GC_COMPRESSED_POINTERS

This option was deprecated, and is no longer used in the autoconf
builds.  Remove the flag `J9VM_GC_COMPRESSED_POINTERS` as it appears to
be entirely unused, and only exists in the cmake build system.

Signed-off-by: Andrew Young <youngar17@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: I don't expect a build to succeed with this change: gc_compressedPointers is still used at  https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/blob/master/debugtools/DDR_VM/src/com/ibm/j9ddr/vm29/pointer/helper/J9ObjectHelper.java#L70
timeline.author: keithc-ca

replies.bodyText:
I'm not sure how this works, but does it matter that we are setting this to true in cmprssptrs.feature?
		<flag id="gc_compressedPointers" value="true"/>
replies.author: youngar
